DOC.brief_summary: This study compare safety efficacy sunitinib combination prednisone versus placebo prednisone patient metastatic castration-resistant prostate cancer progress treatment docetaxel-containing chemotherapy regimen . This second-line study .
DOC.brief_title: Sunitinib Plus Prednisone In Patients With Metastatic Castration-Resistant Prostate Cancer After Failure Of Docetaxel Chemotherapy
DOC.criteria: Histologically cytologically confirm adenocarcinoma prostate . Progressive , metastatic castrationresistant prostate cancer failure docetaxel chemotherapy ( resistant intolerant ) . Progressive disease base PSA progression , RECIST , positive bone scan . ECOG 0 1 . Prior treatment sunitinib and/or 1 prior chemotherapy regimen metastatic disease set . Chemotherapy within 3 week . Impending complication bone metastasis . Ongoing urinary obstruction . Cardiac dysfunction , QTc > 470 msec . CNS involvement .
